TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CborReader extends System.Object

summary.span: 简明二进制对象表示 (CBOR) 编码数据的有状态且仅向前兼容的读取器。

span.span: A stateful, forward-only reader for Concise Binary Object Representation (CBOR) encoded data.

MemberSignature.Value: public CborReader (ReadOnlyMemory<byte> data, System.Formats.Cbor.CborConformanceMode conformanceMode = System.Formats.Cbor.CborConformanceMode.Strict, bool allowMultipleRootLevelValues = false);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> data, valuetype System.Formats.Cbor.CborConformanceMode conformanceMode, bool allowMultipleRootLevelValues) cil managed

Public Sub New (data As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte), Optional conformanceMode As CborConformanceMode = System.Formats.Cbor.CborConformanceMode.Strict, Optional allowMultipleRootLevelValues As Boolean = false)
new System.Formats.Cbor.CborReader : ReadOnlyMemory<byte> * System.Formats.Cbor.CborConformanceMode * bool -> System.Formats.Cbor.CborReader

param.name: data
param.span: 要读取的 CBOR 已编码数据。

span.span: The CBOR encoded data to read.

param.name: conformanceMode
param.span: 枚举值之一，指定指导对已编码数据执行的检查的一致性模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values to specify a conformance mode guiding the checks performed on the encoded data.

param.span: 默认为 一致性模式。

span.span: Defaults to conformance mode.

param.name: allowMultipleRootLevelValues
param.span: 如果为 ，则指明读取器支持多个根级别值；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate that multiple root-level values are supported by the reader; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用给定配置在指定的 上初始化 实例。

span.span: Initializes a instance over the specified with the given configuration.

exception.span: 未定义 。

span.span: is not defined.

summary.span: 获取一个值，此值指明此读取器是否允许多个根级别 CBOR 数据项。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this reader allows multiple root-level CBOR data items.

span.span: Gets the total number of unread bytes in the buffer.

value.span: 缓冲区中读取的字节的总数。

span.span: The total number of unread bytes in the buffer.

summary.span: 获取此读取器使用的一致性模式。

span.span: Gets the conformance mode used by this reader.

value.span: 枚举值之一，表示此读取器使用的一致性模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the conformance mode used by this reader.

public: property int CurrentDepth { int get(); };

summary.span: 读取下一个 CBOR 令牌，而不推进读取器。

span.span: Reads the next CBOR token, without advancing the reader.

returns.span: 表示当前 CBOR 读取器状态的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the current CBOR reader state.

exception.span: 基础数据不是格式标准的 CBOR 编码。

span.span: The underlying data is not a well-formed CBOR encoding.

summary.span: 将下一个数据项作为语义标记（主要类型 6）读取，而不推进读取器。

span.span: Reads the next data item as a semantic tag (major type 6), without advancing the reader.
The decoded value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在需要在运行时确定语义值解码器的方案中很有用。Useful in scenarios where the semantic value decoder needs to be determined at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> ReadStartMap() cil managed
Public Function ReadStartMap () As Nullable(Of Integer)

summary.span: 将下一个数据项作为地图（主要类型 5）的开头读取。

span.span: Reads the next data item as the start of a map (major type 5).

returns.span: 确定长度的地图中的键值对数；如果地图是不确定长度的，则为 。

span.span: The number of key-value pairs in a definite-length map, or if the map is indefinite-length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射内容的使用方式与数组的已声明大小的长度相同。Map contents are consumed as if they were arrays twice the length of the map's declared size. 例如，对于 `1` `int` `string` 和的连续调用，必须使用包含类型值为类型的键的大小的映射 。For instance, a map of size `1` containing a key of type `int` with a value of type `string` must be consumed by successive calls to and . 由调用方来跟踪下一个值是键还是值。It is up to the caller to keep track of whether the next value is a key or a value. 从根本上讲，这是一项技术限制，这是因为 CBOR 允许任意类型的键，例如，映射可以包含映射自身的键。Fundamentally, this is a technical restriction stemming from the fact that CBOR allows keys of arbitrary type, for instance a map can contain keys that are maps themselves.
